column1: @FoodBankWMA At Lorraine’s they’ve an increase of individuals using their services rise from 600 people a month to 900/1000 people a month during COVID19.   #MontesMarch

When you support the @FoodBankWMA you support local orgs/food pantries like MLK Family Services Lorraine’s Soup Kitchen & Kate’s Kitchen.   They are seeing an increase in demand from COVID19.   You can help meet the need: https://t.co/P9BX0bV0qD  #MontesMarch

COVID-19 hasn’t been easy for anyone but the live event industry has been one of the hardest hit.   In one week we can elect leaders who value workers & understand the urgency of this moment & the need to help those who have been hurt this year through no fault of their own. https://t.co/R4QqynRByD
Nearly 50 million Americans who don’t have enough to eat. Food lines stretch around the corner at food banks because of COVID-19. But not a single question from Chris Wallace tonight about hunger.
Donald Trump still has no plan to deal with the coronavirus. #TrumpLied200KDied
What kind of leader — what kind of person — mocks mask wearing on the day America surpassed 200000 COVID related deaths when we know wearing a mask will literally save lives?

The worst drop in our nation's history.   Millions are unemployed. Rent is due.   Positive coronavirus cases are on the rise.  Mitch McConnell's plans?   Take no action for TWO MONTHS & adjourn for a long weekend.   Shameful. https://t.co/uVNX7SjKBC
I don’t know who needs to hear this but a COVID relief package should prioritize food over fighter jets.

May 15:  - 80000 COVID related deaths  - 1.4 million positive cases - 36 million unemployed   Today:  - 140000 COVID related deaths  - 3.8 million positive cases  - 51 million unemployed   9 weeks Senate Republicans made the American people wait.   Shame on them. https://t.co/Cos20A8NUx

I don't know who needs to hear this (the president) but "The United States' alarming rise in coronavirus cases isn't due to increased testing."  The more you know...  https://t.co/kmUouAVnhN https://t.co/lrUeQ7LWcP

I'm glad that the House passed my bill to create a bipartisan Select Committee on the Coronavirus Crisis to ensure that taxpayer $$ is used properly & efficiently - including prioritizing workers over corporate profits.    Proud to stand with @JoeBiden & @ewarren in this fight. https://t.co/44K2BRMX6D

We need massive public infrastructure investments now more than ever especially in our medical facilities. We can put thousands of works like @GoIUPAT back to work to help our communities recover from #COVID19 https://t.co/3xh29ATXxC
Questions about essential vs. non-essential businesses? #COVID19   https://t.co/44uO7N8MUi

If you are looking for ways to offer assistance - or seeking assistance - check out the Worcester Together partnership between @TweetWorcester & @UnitedWayofCM.   Now more than ever we must stand together.   #Worcester #COVIDー19 https://t.co/4QcSdwUYKv
